Detailed Description

A class responsible for a segment of shared-between-processes memory.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RawSharedMemory::RawSharedMemory ( size_t  size,
const string &  pathName,
char  id,
bool  freeOnExit = true 
)

Creates a zero-initialized shared memory segment of a given size. The shared memory is attached to the calling process.

Parameters:
size The size, in bytes, of the shared memory segment.
pathName A path to an existing file.
id A char to identify the shared memory object.
freeOnExit Whether the physical shared memory segment should be deallocated when the SharedMemory is destroyed.

RawSharedMemory::~RawSharedMemory (  ) 

Detaches the shared memory from the calling process and, in case freeOnExit is true, the physical shared memory is destroyed.
